description: Returns a list of Amazon Managed Grafana workspaces in the account, with some information about each workspace. For more complete information about one workspace, use DescribeWorkspace.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use when requesting the next set of workspaces.

nested_items.name: workspaces
nested_items.description: An array of structures that contain some information about the workspaces in the account.

nested_items.name: authentication
nested_items.description: A structure containing information about the authentication methods used in the workspace.

nested_items.name: providers
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the workspace uses SAML, IAM Identity Center, or both methods for user authentication.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: samlConfigurationStatus
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the workplace's user authentication method is fully configured.

nested_items.name: created
nested_items.description: The date that the workspace was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The customer-entered description of the workspace.

nested_items.name: endpoint
nested_items.description: The URL endpoint to use to access the Grafana console in the workspace.

nested_items.name: grafanaToken
nested_items.description: The token that ties this workspace to a Grafana Labs account. For more information, see Link your account with Grafana Labs.

nested_items.name: grafanaVersion
nested_items.description: The Grafana version that the workspace is running.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the workspace.

nested_items.name: licenseType
nested_items.description: Specifies whether this workspace has a full Grafana Enterprise license.

nested_items.name: modified
nested_items.description: The most recent date that the workspace was modified.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the workspace.

nested_items.name: notificationDestinations
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services notification channels that Amazon Managed Grafana can automatically create IAM roles and permissions for, which allows Amazon Managed Grafana to use these channels.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the workspace.
(string) ---
(string) ---
